statements: UPDATE sales_data SET unit_price = 15.50 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE sales_data SET quantity_sold = 100 WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE sales_data SET total_sales = 5000.00 WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE sales_data SET unit_price = unit_price * 1.1, total_sales = unit_price * quantity_sold WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE sales_data SET unit_price = unit_price * 1.05, total_sales = unit_price * quantity_sold WHERE total_sales > 1000;
UPDATE sales_data SET quantity_sold = quantity_sold + 10, total_sales = unit_price * (quantity_sold + 10) WHERE product_name LIKE 'Apple%';
UPDATE products SET product_price = 15.99 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE sales_data SET sale_amount = 100.50 WHERE sale_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET product_category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE products SET product_price = product_price * 1.1 WHERE product_price < 100
UPDATE sales_data SET sale_amount = sale_amount * 1.05 WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
UPDATE products p JOIN sales_data s ON p.product_id = s.product_id SET p.product_price = p.product_price + s.sale_amount * 0.1
UPDATE products SET price = 20.99 WHERE product_id = '1a2b3c';
UPDATE sales SET quantity = 10 WHERE sale_id = '4d5e6f';
UPDATE customers SET age = 35 WHERE customer_id = '7g8h9i';
UPDATE products SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE category = 'Electronics';
UPDATE sales SET quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE customers SET age = CASE WHEN gender = 'Male' THEN age + 1 ELSE age END WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM sales WHERE quantity > 5);
UPDATE products SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE category = 'Electronics';
UPDATE orders SET quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE order_date = '2022-05-10';
UPDATE pricing_strategies SET discount = 0.15 WHERE strategy_id = 1;

UPDATE orders SET quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
